name: DAFS, Direct Access File System
short_description: The DAFS protocol is a new file-access protocol designed to take advantage of emerging RDMA (remote direct memory access) interconnect technologies such as InfiniBand, VI and iWARP.  See http://www.dafscollaborative.org/ for detailed DAFS information.
